HEADLINE: Transcript of the Conference Call held for Gujarat Fluorochemicals Limited with Investors / Analysts of the Company on 30th July, 2020 post declaration of the Audited Annual Financial Statements and Results  of the Company for the Financial Year ended on 31st March, 2020 and Unaudited Financial Results of the Company for the First quarter ended on 30th June, 2020. The same is also available on the Company's website at www.gfl.co.in.

With reference to our letter dated 17th October, 2022 and pursuant to Regulation 30 and 46(2)(oa) of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015, we are enclosing herewith transcript of the Conference Call held with Investors / Analysts of the Company held on Wednesday, 19th October, 2022 at 16:00 (IST) to discuss the 2Q FY 2023 financial performance of the Company. 

The above information will also be made available on the website of the Company: www.gfl.co.in.

With the reference to our letter dated 22nd July, 2022 and pursuant to Regulation 30 and 46(2)(oa) of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015  we are enclosing herewith transcript of the Earnings Call held with Investors / Analysts of the Company on 27th July, 2022, at 16:00(IST) pertaining to  declaration of the Unaudited Financial Results for the first quarter ended 30th June, 2022. The same is also available ....

With reference to our letter dated May 10, 2022  and pursuant to Regulation 30 and  46(2) (ao) of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements ) Regulations, 2015,  we are enclosing herewith the Transcript of Earnings Call with Investors/Analyst held on 13th May, 2022 at 16:00 (IST) pertaining to  Audited Financial Results of the Company for the Quarter and Year  ended on 31st March, 2022.

you are requested to take same on record
